Title: Bash
Plot: Peter makes a visit to Heylia's house with some of his DEA friends. Nancy and Conrad install a safe in the grow house. Doug tries to ruin Celia's new job by showing her up at a City Council meeting. Silas and Shane celebrate their dad's birthday.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: David Goldman, Shawn Michael Patrick, Christopher Allen Nelson, Ron Canada
